survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Car Wash Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their experience with our car wash services to improve quality and customer satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the car wash service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the car wash service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following car wash services have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections for a comprehensive understanding of service usage.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Include an 'Other' option with a text input field.

script.question_text: Which of the following car wash services have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing our car wash service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights about customer motivations.

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing our car wash service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our car wash service to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood of recommendation. Include an NPS (Net Promoter Score) calculation if applicable.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our car wash service to others?

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving our car wash service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback and suggestions.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving our car wash service?
